dict.acceptation: 山，山岳；山脉；一大堆；大量；

sent.orig: Qin-ba mountain area refers to the vast area between Qin-ling mountain range and Da-ba-shan mountain range.
sent.trans: 秦巴山区是指秦岭山脉与大巴山山脉之间的广大区域。

sent.orig: West-to-East Mountain Ranges, including the Tianshan-Yinshan-Yanshan Mountain Ridge, the Kunlun-Qinling-Dabie Mountain Ridge and the Nanling Ridge.
sent.trans: 东西走向：天山-阴山-燕山山系；昆仑山-大别山山系和南岭山系。

sent.orig: Also called Taihe Mountain and Xianshi Mountain,the Wudang Mountain is located in Danjiangkou City,Hubei Province.
sent.trans: 武当山旧称太和山、仙石山。位于湖北省丹江口市。

sent.orig: Are Huashan Mountain, Huashan Mountain beauty spot, Shaanxi Huashan Huashan Mountain beauty spot touring, website?
sent.trans: 华山，华山景区，陕西华山，陕西华山旅游景区，网站是？

sent.orig: Magic mountain Beida, as well as a variety of strange places and that mountain mountain trees.
sent.trans: 北大山的神奇，还有那山上山下各种奇特地树木。
